patthana22.25:1.1: Naajjhattaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.25:2.1: Nabahiddhā nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana22.25:4.1: Naajjhattārammaṇaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana22.25:5.1: Nabahiddhārammaṇaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana22.25:6.1: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā dve …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate cha.
